alerts.text: Can only be performed before an auction has started.
Only the owner of the auction can execute UpdateAuction.

coin_denom.ui:title: Coin Denomination
coin_denom.ui:description: The denomination of the coin which auction bids should be placed in.
coin_denom.ui:help: Should be micro units, such as uandr instead of andr. All characters should be lower case.

duration.ui:title: Auction Duration
duration.ui:description: The amount of time the auction will run for.
duration.ui:help: The value should be declared in milliseconds.

min_bid.ui:title: Minimum Bid
min_bid.ui:description: The initial starting bid amount which must be met in order for the auction to close successfully.
min_bid.ui:help: Should be numeric only. The value will be based on the declared denomination (which is in micro-units)

start_time.ui:title: Auction Start Time
start_time.ui:description: Choose the start time and date for when the auction should begin.
start_time.ui:help: The value will appear in milliseconds since the epoch.

token_address.ui:description: Enter the address of the token whose auction you wish to update.

token_id.ui:description: Enter the token ID of the token you wish to update.
